comments.author: climonite.8537
comments.body: Hi, at the moment our TS bot is not accepting any Api keys it will not respond and it removes the permissions even, this started a few hours ago i believe. Is there anything wrong at ANETs end since I dont see any msg about this at the moment I also hear and read people have problems loggin in so for that reason I come here and ask as the bot works normaly fine and should not have any problems.
